text: Nikitas M. Kaklamanis (born 1 April 1946) is a Greek politician who has been the 14th Speaker of the Hellenic Parliament since 2025. He was the mayor of Athens from 2007 to 2010. He was Minister for Health and Social Solidarity from 2004 to 2006. ==References== ==Other websites== * City Mayors Profile of Nikitas Kaklamanis Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Hellenic Parliament Category:Mayors of Athens
title: Nikitas Kaklamanis
